definition: relating to an inhabitant of a northern state in the United States, especially a Union soldier during the Civil War, typically used by inhabitants of the southern United States as a pejorative term, an inhabitant of a northern state in the United States, especially a Union soldier during the Civil War, typically used by inhabitants of the southern United States as a pejorative term
